resources.string:
Please click the add "(+)" button on top of the menu bar to add the items in record.

 Click on "Show Entries" button to see the details of bill of a particular day.

The admin of this app can use filters to query the entries for:
(a) Particular Date. (b) Particular month.

The admin can delete any entry from the database if needed.

For any feedback, contact us by clicking on About us tab in the menu.

Everytime a new entry is added and/or deleted, the app asks for a confirmation to recheck the details.

Have fun!
